messages.subject: Re: Ren
messages.msgSnippet: Ren, you are also on my mind as well as everyone in your area. We ve been through many hurricanes and during the last big one, we said we d leave the next
messages.messageBody:
Ren, you are also on my mind as well as everyone in your area. We've
been through many hurricanes and during the last big one, we said
we'd leave the next time....big meaning large cat 3 or worse.
Flooding is so nasty and it creeps in just when you think the worst
is over. I can only hope you and your family are in a safe place.
Sara in NC

messages.subject: Ren
messages.msgSnippet: Ren, I m pretty quiet on the list, but just want you to know that I m thinking of you! (My mother just went through a direct hit from Frances.)  I hope your
messages.messageBody:
Ren,
I'm pretty quiet on the list, but just want you to know that I'm thinking of you! (My mother just went through a direct hit from Frances.) I hope your family is safe!
Take Care, Tess

messages.subject: Ren
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/11/02 7:39:26 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/11/02 7:39:26 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Hi Ren. I tried looking at pensacolaunschoolers.com and received an
error message. Perhaps the address isn't correct? Thanks. Donna in
Florida. >>

No, it's correct. And I was just there today, so I'm very sure it's up and
running properly. I bet there was just a busy server or something.
If you spelled it exactly like you did here at this post, it should work. Try
again and let me know if you have any problems!

Ren
"Knowledge will not always take the place of simple observation."
~Arnold Lobel
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
